remarks: Value of a function composition.  Similar to second part of Theorem 3H of [Enderton] p. 47.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Oct-2004.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 22-Oct-2011.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 16-Oct-2014.)
statement: fvco2 $p |- ( ( G Fn A /\ X e. A ) -> ( ( F o. G ) ` X ) = ( F ` ( G ` X ) ) ) $.
